seo.title: ALOOH Mexico City
seo.description: Join us for an intimate evening of cocktails and conversations before ALOOH Mexico City kicks off!

hero.title: Connect with media owners and agencies from around the world at Broadsign's networking event
pars: Join us for an intimate evening of cocktails and conversations before ALOOH Mexico City kicks off!
The event will be a great opportunity to network with industry peers and participate in conversations on all the exciting things happening in the world of OOH.

place: Anatole France 98, Polanco, Polanco III Secc, Miguel Hidalgo

hosts.name: Guillermo García Maruny
hosts.title: Director of Business Development, Programmatic Media

hosts.name: Joe Cotugno
hosts.title: Sr. Vice President of International Operations

thankYouForRegistering: We look forward to seeing you in Mexico City.
Be sure to add the event to your calendar to stay up-to-date:
